errors.error_description: Added unnecessary pip dependencies (cmake, numpy, setuptools) when using conda pre-built binaries
correction_candidates: $ conda install --channel=numba llvmlite cmake numpy setuptools

$ conda install --channel=numba llvmlite
   $ conda install cmake numpy setuptools
$ pip install llvmlite cmake numpy setuptools

errors.error_description: Documentation link points to nonexistent path /nonexistent.html instead of /index.html
